string.name: link
string.a: Click here to find additional recipes.

resources.string: Eatright.org provides evidence-based information on nutrition, healthy eating, and resources for dietitians.
Mayoclinic.org Offers reliable nutrition information, healthy recipes, and practical tips for maintaining a balanced diet.
Nutrition.gov A comprehensive resource for nutrition education and guidance, providing access to credible information from various government agencies.
World Health Organization (WHO) provides global guidelines, reports, and resources on nutrition and healthy eating habits.
Heart.org Offers resources and tips for heart-healthy eating, including recipes and guidance on reducing sodium and saturated fats.
NIH.gov Provides information on nutrition for older adults, including tips on maintaining a healthy diet as we age.
